name: Hologram Message
instruction: Can you figure out how to make the Emperor's hologram message? Or will you change R2-D2 to BB-8 and have him display something else?

suggestions.title: Change who the hologram is showing.
suggestions.content: Pick a different character from the dropdown list.

suggestions.title: Make the hologram say something else.
suggestions.content: Choose another quote from the dropdown list.

suggestions.title: Change the background.
suggestions.content: Pick a new location for your hologram message.
